item.title: EDUCATION KALONâ€™S VISIT TO CST DARJEELING AND CST SONADA
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Kalon for Department of Education, Mr. Ngodup Tsering visited CST Darjeeling and CST Sonada on 13th and 14th October respectively.     He has visited settlement offices in both the places and, Tibetan refugees self help centre in Darjeeling and Tibetan cooperative society in Sonada.     During the visit he has inspected all the...

item.title: VISIT OF EDUCATION KALON TO NORTH-EAST TIBETAN SCHOOLS
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Education Kalon visited North-East Tibetan Schools 8th October, 2014: Mr. Ngodup Tsering Education Kalon for Department of Education, CTA, has attended the Golden Jubilee Celebration of CST Kalimpong as Guest of Honour. The Chief Guest for the opening ceremony was Dr. Lobsang Sangay, Sikyong, CTA. Education Kalon addressed the students, staff members and public...
